GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by date in descending order, with no 'body' for any article

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article, corresponding to the article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with a given article_id, sorted by created_at date in descending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a new comment associated with a given article_id, when successfully added to the database

example response.author: lurker
example response.body: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an updated article associated with an article_id

example response.title: Student SUES Mitch!
example response.author: rogersop
example response.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

DELETE //api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves no content; removes a comment by the given comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
